alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:01PM CDT until July 03 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX AND NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located between Hawarden and Ireton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Rural areas between Hawarden and Ireton through 545 PM CDT. This storm produced nickel size hail in Hawarden at 456 pm CDT. A wind gust to 52 mph was recorded at a personal weather station 5 miles southeast of Hawarden at 446 pm. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
